document_data.name: Protection From Deathbane
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from deathbane''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[necromancer]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed a caster to protect an [[undead]] creature from spells that were specifically created to harm undead creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], ash. During casting, the caster formed a circle of the ash around the target undead creature.
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
